description:
Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is your comprehensive Islamic companion, designed to support your daily spiritual journey. With essential features like accurate prayer time reminders, Azkar collection, and Qibla direction, it helps strengthen your faith and manage your daily worship seamlessly.

Key Features:

* Accurate Prayer Times: Never miss a prayer again! Get precise notifications for all Salah times (Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) based on your location.
* Azkar & Duas: Immerse yourself in spiritual invocations with a curated collection of Azkar and Duas, perfect for morning, evening, and every moment in between. Strengthen your connection with Allah through heartfelt invocations.
* Tasbih Counter: Elevate your Dhikr practice with the built-in Tasbih Counter. This feature includes an electronic tasbih and prayer bead counter to help you track your count while reciting your prayer or Dua.
* Qibla Direction: Find the Qibla direction accurately, no matter where you are. The integrated Qibla compass ensures precise alignment for your prayers.
* Quran Access: Read and reflect on the Holy Quran directly within the app. The clear and user-friendly interface allows for easy navigation between chapters and verses, supporting your daily recitation goals.
* Prayer Reminders: Never miss a prayer with customizable reminders that fit your routine. Whether it's a gentle nudge for Fajr or a midday reminder for Dhuhr, you'll stay connected to your worship schedule.

Muslim: Quran, Athan & Qibla is designed to be your trusted spiritual companion, integrating faith seamlessly into your daily routine. Whether you're managing prayer times, reflecting on Quranic verses, or seeking solace in Azkar and Duas, this app supports your spiritual growth and devotion.

Download now and experience the convenience, guidance, and fulfillment of having a complete Islamic companion right at your fingertips. Stay connected to your faith, no matter where life takes you.

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

Easy Translate - AI Translate uses advanced AI to translate text, speech, images, and dialogues, plus a ChatGPT-style AI assistant and a daily phrase learning feature to help you speak with confidence.

Key Features:
Text Translation - Type or paste text and get fast, accurate translations across many languages.
Voice Translation - Speak naturally and hear or view real-time translations for smooth conversations.
Image Translation - Translate text from photos or camera captures using built-in OCR.
Dialogues Translation - Real-time bilingual conversations that keep your dialogue flowing.
AI ChatGPT-style Conversation - Interact with an intelligent AI assistant for practice, explanations, and language guidance.
Daily Phrases - A new practical phrase every day with examples to help you use it in real life.

Why You'll Love It:
AI-powered translations that are quick and reliableIntuitive, user-friendly interface for travel, study, and work.
Wide language support with context and usage notes.
Translate and review, view history, and build your own phrasebook.
Privacy-focused design with clear data controls.

How It Works:

Switch between translation, conversation, and AI chat modes as needed.
Access daily phrases and practice them in real-life scenarios.

Use Cases:
Traveling, dining out, shopping, studying, business meetings, and everyday chats.
Reading menus, signs, documents, emails, and messages with ease.
Languages and Availability.

Privacy and Security:
We prioritize your privacy. Translation data is used to provide the service and is configurable in settings.
You control your history and how your data is handled.

Boost your dating confidence with Badoo— the dating app that makes it easy to express your true self.
 
It’s an encouraging, safe space that’s designed to help you make more meaningful connections.
 
How? By keeping it simple, helping you take action with confidence, and giving you the features and support you need to find whatever you’re searching for. Whether that’s dates, a long-term relationship, new friends, or chats.

Plus, with our latest tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, you can say hello to a fun and authentic dating experience. 
 
Download Badoo to take your dating confidence to another level."

Back yourself
On Badoo, it’s all about celebrating you and staying true to your needs. With our various features, it’s easy to put yourself out there with confidence.
Trust your experience
Badoo is a platform that prioritises authenticity. Profile photos can be verified and there are strict user guidelines in place.

How Badoo works
Focusing on who you are and what you want, here are some features making it easier for you to meet your kind of people:  
-Advanced Filters: Finesse your search, and save your time
-Profile Questions: Easily champion your personality
- People Nearby: Meet daters around you
- Encounters: Straight forward swiping, right to connect and left for skip
- Video Chat: Connect with your matches through face to face video calling
- Verified profiles: We have a three-step verification process which, once completed, you can choose to only interact with other verified profiles and find friends
- Blur intimate photos: Using AI, our Private Detector feature detects explicit photos and will let you decide if you want to view or block the image
- Deception Detector: Our new tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, so you can have a fun and authentic dating experience"

Go Premium
Maximise your dating experience. When you upgrade to Badoo Premium, you’ll unlock plenty of features that will make it even easier to find meaningful connections:

- See who's already liked you
- Find exactly what you’re looking for with unlimited Advanced Filters
- Get your messages read first
- Send unlimited likes
 - Control who sees your profile with Invisible Mode
- Undo accidental left swipes  
- And much more...

The price varies by country and may change without notice, but you can always see the exact price in the app. We will charge your card and your subscription will be automatically renewed unless you deactivate the automatic recharge a minimum of 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. Badoo Premium is flexible and adapts to your needs - you can cancel your subscription at any time.

Prayer Times is a comprehensive mobile application designed to help Muslims observe their daily spiritual practices with precision and ease. Whether you are at home, at work, or traveling, the app ensures you stay connected to your faith and perform your prayers on time.

Accurate Muslim Prayer Times:
Stay informed of the five daily prayer times, accurately calculated based on your location. The app covers all essential prayers:
- Fajr – Dawn prayer
- Dhuhr – Midday prayer
- Asr – Afternoon prayer
- Maghrib – Sunset prayer
- Isha – Night prayer

Athan Notifications:
Receive timely Athan (call to prayer) alerts to remind you when it is time to pray. You can choose from a variety of authentic Azan recordings.

Holy Quran – Read and Listen:
Access the complete Holy Quran directly in the app. Read with clear Arabic text and various translations, or listen to high-quality audio recitations from well-known Qaris.

Qibla Compass:
Easily find the Qibla direction from any location in the world with the built-in compass, guiding you toward the Kaaba in Mecca.

Live Broadcast from Mecca:
Watch a live stream from Masjid al-Haram in Mecca, allowing you to experience the spiritual atmosphere of the holy city in real time.

Dua Collection:
Explore a carefully selected library of Duas (supplications) for various situations and daily needs.

Mosque Finder:
Quickly locate nearby mosques using an interactive map, making it simple to find a place for prayer wherever you are.

Islamic Date Converter:
Convert dates between the Gregorian calendar and the Islamic (Hijri) calendar, helping you track significant Islamic dates and events.

Hijri Calendar:
View the Hijri calendar, complete with Islamic months and key religious dates to help you stay informed throughout the year.

Tasbeeh Counter:
Keep track of your dhikr with the Tasbeeh counter, making it easier to focus on your spiritual remembrance.

Special Features for Ramadan:
During the holy month of Ramadan, the app provides additional helpful features to support your worship and fasting. These include Ramadan-specific prayer times, Suhoor and Iftar schedules, and other tools designed to make your Ramadan experience more meaningful and organized.

Revolutionizing Entertainment Discovery with Conversational AI

PipeCalc AI transforms how audiences find and enjoy movies and TV. Instead of static genre lists, our platform introduces Sage, a conversational AI that understands mood, context, and personal taste. Tell Sage about your perfect evening, current vibe, or favorite themes and receive recommendations that feel natural and uniquely tailored.

What Makes PipeCalc AI Different

Conversational Cinema Intelligence
Sage doesn’t just filter data—it chats with you, turning discovery into a human-like conversation and delivering suggestions that cross typical category lines.

Multi-Layer Discovery

Sage (AI Chat): Context-aware movie guide.

Voyager: Curated collections such as Cinema Magnetism for trending hits and Narrative Mastery for critic favorites.

Vault: Smart watchlist with cross-platform sync.

Nexus: Central hub for personal preferences.

Distinctive Design

Our Cinematic Glassmorphism interface pairs a rich dark theme with soft blue highlights to reduce eye strain. Proprietary gradients, spring-physics animations, and glass-effect overlays create depth and elegance, while professional SF-Symbol icons and a floating tab bar keep navigation clean and modern.

Intelligent Curation

PipeCalc AI’s algorithms highlight what matters now:

Today’s Pulse: Real-time trending analysis.

Weekly Obsessions: Predictive picks from social buzz.

Series Zeitgeist: Tracks shows shaping culture.

Context-aware genre filters for precise results.

Fair & Flexible Access

Our credit system makes premium AI free to explore: watch optional ads to earn credits—no mandatory subscription. This ethical model supports development while respecting user choice.

Platform-Neutral Recommendations

PipeCalc AI integrates with major streaming services and shows only content you can actually watch, eliminating the frustration of unavailable titles.

Built for Privacy & Performance

Developed in SwiftUI and powered by the OpenRouter API plus TMDB’s database, PipeCalc AI offers:

Local caching for smooth offline browsing.

End-to-end encryption of user preferences.

Zero personal data collection beyond anonymous metrics.

Why It Belongs on the App Store

PipeCalc AI is more than a TMDB wrapper:

Unique Interaction: Conversational AI that understands context, not just keywords.

Original Visual Style: A fully custom cinematic aesthetic.

Proprietary Curation: Exclusive naming and content groupings.

Ethical Monetization: Credit system keeps AI access inclusive.

Thoughtful Experience: From onboarding to daily use, every detail is designed for enjoyment.

Who It’s For

Cinephiles seeking deep discovery and hidden gems.

Casual Viewers wanting quick, mood-based picks.

Families needing age-appropriate suggestions.

International Users with multi-language support and regional awareness.

Roadmap for Innovation

Coming features include advanced mood detection, social watch parties, AR poster scanning, voice navigation, and collaborative watchlists.

PipeCalc AI isn’t just another movie list app—it’s a new way to experience stories. By combining advanced AI, striking design, and user-first values, we’re redefining entertainment discovery one conversation at a time.

Your multi-sport companion for live scores, fixtures, highlights, standings, and team insights—all in a fast, neon-clean iOS experience. Pick your favorite sports and leagues; our app personalizes the home feed, notifications, and suggestions around what you love.

Why It Stands Out

Multi-Sport, One Flow: Easily switch between football, basketball, American football, baseball, and more—all organized the same, so you never relearn the app.

Match-Day Engine: From fixtures to live stats, line-ups, timelines, and highlights, the app keeps the essential match details together and easy to swipe.

Smart Highlights: Surfaces official match videos and reputable publisher highlights when available; plays inline for a seamless experience.

Built for Personalization: Onboarding captures your favorite leagues and teams; the app tailors scores, alerts, and suggestions to you.

Fast, Neon-Clean UI: SwiftUI interface with a dark-first design, crisp visuals, and smooth interactions.

Core Features

Live & Upcoming: Real-time scores and upcoming fixtures, prioritized for your favorites.

Match Centre: Overview, timeline, stats, line-ups, and media—organized in clear tabs.

Highlights Hub: Match highlights and media with transparent source context.

News You’ll Care About: Curated football news headlines from recognized outlets; team-focused updates when you follow clubs.

Powerful Search: Quickly find teams, players, and events; helpful suggestions for popular clubs and stars.

Favorites & Alerts: Follow leagues and teams; granular notifications for match start, live updates, and final results.

Calendar Sync: Add fixtures to your iOS Calendar with one tap, including reminders.

Standings & Teams: League tables, squads, player profiles, and form at a glance.

Privacy & Principles

No Account Required: Your favorites, alerts, and preferences stay on your device.

Transparent Sources: Uses public sports APIs, official channels, and reputable publishers. The app does not host copyrighted streams or attempt to bypass DRM.

Independent App: Not affiliated with or endorsed by leagues, teams, or rights holders.

Availability Notes

Coverage and highlight availability can vary by sport, league, region, and publisher rights.

Make every match day shine—across your favorite sports.
Turn on your leagues, set your alerts, and let Sport Live bring live scores, highlights, and the details that matter into one fast, focused experience.

Alipay is a leading open platform for payments and digital services in China.

Users with a Chinese ID and bank account can use Alipay to make payments online and in person at various merchants outside of China as they travel for leisure, business, or study. 

Foreign visitors to China can connect their credit card to take advantage of Alipay’s widespread acceptance by tens of millions of merchants across the country. Alipay is not designed or intended for use by foreign users in their home country or anywhere outside of China.

Prayer Time is a mobile application designed to help Muslims worldwide to facilitate their daily prayers. With its user-friendly interface and practical features, Prayer Time makes it easy for worshippers to ensure that all their prayers are performed on time and with devotion.

- One of the most notable features of Prayer Time is its prayer reminder. The app provides a call to prayer with the exact time for daily prayers, including Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha. This feature ensures that users are reminded to perform their daily prayers in a timely and convenient manner.

- Another essential feature of Prayer Time is the direction of the Qibla. Muslims worldwide should turn their faces towards the Kaaba in Mecca during prayer. Prayer Time helps users to find the correct direction of the Qibla so that they can perform their prayers with accuracy and devotion.

- Additionally, Prayer Time provides users with access to the Holy Quran. As the scripture of Islam, the Quran is an essential part of Muslim prayer. Users can read the Quran during their prayers through the app, making it a convenient and accessible feature for worshippers.

- The Islamic calendar is another vital feature of Prayer Time. It shows important Muslim dates, such as Ramadan and Kurban Bayram, making it easy for users to keep track of important dates and events in the Islamic calendar.

- Watch the live stream of the Kaaba in Mecca 24/7 on your mobile in HD quality. Immerse yourself in the sacred atmosphere, witnessing prayers, ritual and gatherings anytime, anywhere, and connect with the global Muslim community.

- Prayer Time also includes information about the 5 pillars of Islam, the 99 names of Allah, and Dua prayer. These features allow users to deepen their knowledge of Islam and enrich their prayer experience.

- Finally, Prayer Time provides access to Tasbih prayer. Tasbih prayer involves the recitation of specific phrases in praise of Allah. The app allows users to perform Tasbih prayer easily, ensuring that they can incorporate this essential aspect of Muslim prayer into their daily routine.

Overall, Prayer Time is an excellent tool for Muslims worldwide to facilitate their daily prayers. With its comprehensive features and practical design, Prayer Time ensures that all the prayers of every Muslim will surely reach Allah.

Download Namaz App: Muslim Prayer Times for iOS now!

Get exact prayer times and real-time information from your favorite mosques. Instantly geolocate the nearest Mosques around you.

• A non-profit project - A dedicated endowment (for the sake of Allah).
• 100% Free and without any Ads, no subscription needed.
• The #1 Mosque Network : Trusted by thousands of mosques across +100 countries.

• Serving millions of Muslims daily, since 2016.
• Open Source: Member of the OSI (Open Source Initiative).

• Community Driven.

Getting to the nearest mosque and connecting with your beloved mosques has never been easier!

Unlike other apps that provide you with approximations, we provide you with the precise timetables set by your Imam.

________________________
PRECISE TIMETABLES


• 100% Accurate: Salah and iqamah times as set by your Imam, based on your mosque's timetable (Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha).
• Azan & Prayer Notifications: Choose from beautiful prayer calls with many muezzin voices and adhan.
• Imsak and Iftar: During the holy month of Ramadan, see the Fasting and Iftar times.
• Qibla direction: Qiblah compass to quickly find the direction to Mecca.
• Set Alarms: Pre-prayer notifications, suhoor, sunrise and iftar.

CALENDAR
• Calendar: See all the important dates, such as Ramadan, Eid-Ul-Fitr and Eid-Ul-Adha.
• Hijri calendar: Available at a glance, and downloadable (.pdf A4 format)

FIND MOSQUES
• Search for Mosques: in more than 47 countries worldwide.
• Mosques around you: Easily find mosques using geolocation, name, city, or address.
• Bookmark your Favorite Mosques: Get their precise prayer timetables updated in real-time.

DONATE, INSTANTLY
• Donate to your Masjid: Support your beloved mosques to keep them open and ready to serve our community.
• Donate to build the house of Allah & gain immense reward: help build permanent structures the entire community can share in the joy of worship.

STAY CONNECTED
• Events & News: Never miss an event happening in your mosques. 
• Important Messages: from your Imam or your Mosque managers.

USEFUL INFORMATION
• Facilities & Amenities: Ablution room, Women's dedicated space, Access for people with disabilities, etc.
• Services: Salat-Ul-Eid, Adults courses, Children courses, Iftar Ramadan, Suhoor, Salat-Ul-Janazah, Parking...etc.
• Contacts: Address, Phone, Email, Website, and Social Network pages.

AT A GLANCE
• Widget: See the prayer times, the following prayer, and the Hijri Date at a glance from your home screen.
• Smartwatch: Apple Watch compatible
• Home Assistant compatible.

THE HOLY QURAN
• Read and listen to the Quran wherever you are

LANGUAGES
• العربية, English, Français, Español, Deutsch,  Italiano, Dutch, Português, Türkçe. More languages are coming incha’Allah.

Cette application de voyance vous permet d'entreprendre un fascinant voyage à travers votre avenir et votre destin. Grâce au pouvoir conjugué de la boule de cristal et des forces de la nature, vous obtiendrez une vision nette de votre futur, 100% naturelle.

Votre destin est intrinsèquement lié à celui de la Terre. C'est pour cette raison que l'écouter confère à la boule de voyance une capacité extraordinaire pour lire les événements qui ponctueront votre vie. Laisser cette énergie gratuite vous envahir est sans doute aujourd'hui l'un des meilleurs moyens pour rester à l'écoute de vous même. Cette application vous y aidera.

La voyance qui utilise les vecteurs naturels de la planète est sans nul doute la plus pure, la plus puissante qui existe.

Ce voyage se déroulera tout simplement par l'intermédiaire de notre boule de voyant qui explorera votre destinée. Choisissez, sans réfléchir, une direction et l'application vous dévoilera une de ses visions naturelles, la votre. Vous pourrez ainsi naviguer d'étape en étape, 5 fois toutes les 4 heures, le temps que toutes les énergies se rechargent pleinement.

Si vous avez des toutes, des peurs, des craintes ou bien si vous ignorez vous situer au sein de ce monde urbanisé à outrance, et bien cette application sera adéquate pour vous.

Step into the world of spiritual serenity with Digital Tasbeeh 3D, a groundbreaking app that seamlessly blends tradition with technology, providing you with a unique and enriching Tasbeeh experience. In the hustle and bustle of today's fast-paced life, finding moments of tranquility and spiritual connection can be challenging. Digital Tasbeeh 3D serves as a digital companion, offering a modern solution for the age-old practice of Tasbeeh and Zikr. Whether you're a devout Muslim or simply someone seeking inner peace, this app is designed to cater to your spiritual needs.



Embracing the Authenticity of Real Tasbeeh:


Digital Tasbeeh 3D goes beyond the ordinary, aiming to replicate the authentic feel of a physical Tasbeeh. The app's lifelike visuals and realistic sound effects are carefully crafted to provide a tangible connection to the age-old tradition of counting Tasbeeh beads. Each tap on the screen resonates with the essence of a traditional Tasbeeh, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in the practice of Zikr with a sense of connection and presence.



Features Tailored to Your Spiritual Growth:


Digital Tasbeeh Counter: Effortlessly count your Tasbeeh with the convenience of a digital counter, eliminating the need for physical beads while preserving the essence of the tradition.



Tasbeeh for Muslim: Specifically designed for Muslim users, this app provides a digital platform for engaging in Tasbeeh and Zikr in accordance with Islamic traditions.



Creative Muslims Tasbeeh: Explore innovative ways to integrate Tasbeeh into your daily routine, fostering mindfulness and spiritual growth beyond traditional practices.



Tally Tasbeeh Counter: Keep precise track of your Tasbeeh counts, allowing you to monitor your spiritual progress and stay dedicated to your journey.



Tasbeeh with Actual Experience: Immerse yourself in an authentic Tasbeeh experience, enhanced by realistic visuals and sound effects, bringing the tradition to life in the digital realm.



Tasbeeh Counter for Free: Experience the benefits of a premium Tasbeeh app without any cost, ensuring that spiritual enrichment is accessible to all, regardless of financial constraints.

Discover Heyama, the exclusive dating app for the African community. We are proud to present an innovative platform that celebrates the traditions, customs, and cultural richness of Africa.

CUSTOMIZED NDOLO SEARCH

Are you tired of swiping endlessly without finding someone who shares your African origins and culture? With Heyama and its innovative algorithm, take advantage of the NDOLO feature that allows you to connect with profiles that share your origins, culture, customs, local dishes, mother tongue, and more.

How it works:

Step 1: Post an ad introducing yourself and describing your ideal partner.

Step 2: Our algorithm recommends your profile to community members who best match your criteria.

Step 3: You are connected with up to 10 profiles, and it's time to make your move!


PERSONALIZED MENTORING TO NOURISH YOUR RELATIONSHIP

If you connect with a community member and are unsure how to nurture the relationship, we provide exclusive advice from our relationship coaches to assist you.


ENJOY GOOD TIMES IN A SAFE ENVIRONMENT

Safety is our top priority at Heyama. We automatically verify user photos to ensure you are engaging with the person depicted in their profile picture. You can trust that each profile you encounter on our platform has been carefully verified.

Furthermore, we offer reporting tools and a dedicated moderation team to promptly address any inappropriate behavior. Any individual reported by our members will be permanently and irrevocably excluded from Heyama.

The dating app bringing people closer to love

Bumble is the dating app where people meet, make connections, and start their love stories. We believe meaningful relationships are the foundation of a happy, healthy life — and we're here to help you find yours with a commitment to member safety and tools that empower confident dating.

Match with the right people, date, and find meaningful connection

Bumble is a free app for meeting singles and building connections grounded in mutual respect and trust. Whether you’re ready to find the one or date for fun, Bumble can help you connect with real people to build something authentic.

As champions of love, we prioritize creating a space where our members feel respected, confident, and empowered to make connections

- Our members are at the heart of everything we do
- We put safety first — so you can date with confidence, knowing you’re connecting with verified matches
- Respect, courage, and joy guide how we show up — and inspire others to do the same

Try our free features — built to make dating easier
- For better connections, conversations, and dates, personalize your profile with interests and prompts to showcase who you are, what you’re into, and what you’re looking for
- Trust that the person you’re talking to is real with ID Verification
- Feel confident with expert-backed dating advice designed to help you succeed
- See what music you bond over by linking your Spotify account
- Video chat and share your favorite pictures with your matches to get to know them better
- Chat with peace of mind — knowing that when you’re talking to new people, all messages must meet our community guidelines
- Get extra reassurance by sharing the details of your meetups with someone you trust
- If you’re ever in need of a dating break, hide your profile with the Snooze Mode (you'll still keep all your matches)

Want even more ways to connect? Bumble Premium unlocks extra features to boost your dating experience
- See everyone who likes you
- Use Advanced Filters like “What are they looking for?” to meet people who share your values, hobbies, and goals
- Rematch with expired connections — so you don’t miss out on a great potential date
- Browse anonymously with Incognito Mode and only seen by who you want to see you
- Extend your matches by 24 hours
- Swipe as much as you like to meet more people
- Tap into dating scenes around the world with Travel Mode
- Stand out and get noticed with free SuperSwipes & Spotlights, refreshed weekly

Inclusivity is key
At Bumble, we promise to support and include all forms of love: straight, gay, lesbian, queer, and beyond. We want everyone in our community to feel safe and welcome. So no matter how you identify, if you're looking for a place to chat, date, and find real love, we’ve got what you’re looking for.

Phone Tracker - Family Locator is an application that uses GPS technology to help you locate and keep track of your family members, friends, and loved ones in real-time on a live, private map. With Circles, you can create a group of people who share their locations within the group, so you can easily track their location history and current location. Invite members by sharing a unique, private 6-digit number, and once they accept the invitation, you can locate them on the map at any time.

The app also includes geofence zones, which allow you to know when any of your circle members enter or leave a certain area by creating a location-based boundary. You can drop a pin on the map to set the center of the geofence at a specific location, name your geolocation, set the radius for it, and get push notifications when someone enters or exits it. This feature can help you ensure that your loved ones are safe by automatically letting you know their whereabouts, without any effort from them.

In case of emergencies, the app includes an SOS function that sends an urgent push notification to all members of your circle when you tap on the SOS button, along with a live update of your location. This feature ensures that your child, partner, or friend can alert you any time they need help or are in danger.

Other features of the app include the ability to view the location history of each circle member, find a lost device using the GPS phone tracker, and manage group circles and geofence zones.

Phone Tracker is your reliable GPS-based family locator and personal tracking app, designed to help keep your loved ones safe. It is not intended for spying or secret surveillance, and it cannot be installed remotely or without consent. To use the service, the user must install the app manually and approve the location-sharing request. By subscribing you can enjoy unlimited alerts, real-time tracking, extended location history and many more features!

app_name: Music X - Best Music Player FM
description:
Allow you to download songs from your storages, support PC/Wi-Fi, Files/iCloud, Dropbox®, Google Drive®.
Easy to use and you can enjoy it for listening to downloaded songs without wifi.

Main Features:
√ Download songs from your storages: PC/Wi-Fi, Files/iCloud, Dropbox®, Google Drive®.
√ Play downloaded songs with powerful Music player.
√ Provide multiple play modes: normal, multi loop, single loop, shuffle.
√ Manage your customized and favorite playlists.
√ Search songs what you like with keywords.
√ Support background playback mode.
√ Provide music playback rankings.
√ Playback bar can help you switch and control playback more quickly.

How to use:
1. On the tab Storage choose the device, app, cloud platform such as: PC/Wi-Fi, Files/iCloud, Dropbox®, Google Drive®.
2. Connect to PC(Your Device and PC/Wi-Fi networks must connect to the same WiFi), Files/iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive with your account (If you have no account, you should register one).
3. Download songs from your storage platform(You should upload your favorite songs to your cloud storages by yourself).
4. You can create and edit your music playlists name.
5. Add the songs to your created music playlists.
6. Choose the songs to play and enjoy it.
